name: A. Exam
statement:
An exam for students will take place in a long and narrow room, so the
students will sit in a line in some order. The teacher suspects that
students with adjacent numbers ( and ) always studied side by side and
became friends and if they take an exam sitting next to each other, they
will help each other for sure.Your task is to choose the maximum number
of students and make such an arrangement of students in the room that no
two students with adjacent numbers sit side by side.
